name: The Seventh Kind
description:
The Seventh Kind

Contact us!

You just crashed on an hostile planet where a god will challenge you. Bring him items to survive to be rewarded with either a bonus or a penalty. It's an arcade FPS where you have to make the best possible score.

Crédits:

-Ratchet & Clank - Veldin - Kyzil Plateau by David Bergeaud
